snippet: Shows continued in full swing Tuesday, with a sparkly setup at Rodarte, a rave at Marc Jacobs and more. Here’s a recap of what happened, traced through the Styles staff’s Twitter feeds.
abstract: Shows continued in full swing Tuesday, with a sparkly setup at Rodarte, a rave at Marc Jacobs and more. Here’s a recap of what happened, traced through the Styles staff’s Twitter feeds.

headline.main: New York Fashion Week Social Media Roundup, Day 6
